metadata.title: CVE-2024-27388 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:SUNRPC: fix some memleaks in gssx_dec_option_arrayThe creds and oa->data need to be freed in the error-handling paths aftertheir allocation. So this patch add these deallocations in thecorresponding paths.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
